item.title: Iranian women continue to fight for freedom
item.description: Nearly six months after Jina Masha Amini was killed for not dressing the way the Islamic Republic wanted to, women without hijab are conquering the streets of Iran. Although it is against the law, many women are taking the risk to make a stand. @DW
item.keywords: DWVC,Iran, women, human rights, hijab, Masha Amini, freedom, self-determination

media:content.media:title: Iranian women continue to fight for freedom
media:content.media:keywords: DWVC,Iran, women, human rights, hijab, Masha Amini, freedom, self-determination

item.title: Taking care of a grandchild orphaned by war
item.description: Many Ukrainians have lost family members because of Russian missile attacks. Surviving relatives are left grieving, often while trying to provide stability for young children orphaned by the war. @DW
item.keywords: DWVC,Ukraine, Russia, missile attack, orphan, war, children

media:content.media:title: Taking care of a grandchild orphaned by war
media:content.media:keywords: DWVC,Ukraine, Russia, missile attack, orphan, war, children

item.title: Sexual harassment in an online world
item.description: The era of a new internet is dawning. The "metaverse", as many call it, could revolutionize the way we work, learn and communicate. But it could also give rise to unprecedented online harassment and abuse.
item.keywords: DWVC,metaverse, sexual harassment, virtual reality, VR, abuse, avatar

media:content.media:title: Sexual harassment in an online world
media:content.media:keywords: DWVC,metaverse, sexual harassment, virtual reality, VR, abuse, avatar

item.title: Afghan woman disguises herself as a man to keep her job
item.description: This Afghan woman disguises herself as a man every day, so she can keep her job as a beekeeper.
item.keywords: DWVC,Afghanistan, woman, human rights, Afghan women

media:content.media:title: Afghan woman disguises herself as a man to keep her job
media:content.media:keywords: DWVC,Afghanistan, woman, human rights, Afghan women

item.title: Can AI fix the world's most pressing problems?
item.description: Experts see massive potential in AI as a problem solver for worldwide issues, such as crime, poverty and pollution. Do you believe AI can fix our modern day problems?
item.keywords: DWVC,Artificial Intelligence, AI, problems, issues, crisis, climate change, crime

media:content.media:title: Can AI fix the world's most pressing problems?

item.title: AI detects breast cancer
item.description: The Blue Box is an AI device that could tell you you might have breast cancer.

item.title: Anglican Church at the verge of split?
item.description: The archbishop of Canterbury, Justin Welby is facing backlash from within the global Anglican Communion, after the Church of England voted to allow priests to bless same-sex couples. @DW
item.keywords: DWVC,Anglican Church, same-sex couples, LGBTQ+, archbishop of Canterbury

media:content.media:title: Anglican Church at the verge of split?
media:content.media:keywords: DWVC,Anglican Church, same-sex couples, LGBTQ+, archbishop of Canterbury

item.title: France's longest river is running dry
item.description: "I'm scared...I've never seen this." France's longest river, the Loire, is drying up as a severe winter drought grips parts of the country. Experts warn restrictions may be necessary again.
item.keywords: DWVC,France, Loire, dried up, drought, climate change, environment

media:content.media:title: France's longest river is running dry
media:content.media:keywords: DWVC,France, Loire, dried up, drought, climate change, environment

item.title: G20 foreign ministers at odds over Ukraine
item.description: The Ukraine war dominated the G20 meeting in India. The United States and its allies called for continued pressure on Russia to end the conflict. But due to Russian and Chinese opposition, a joint statement was off the table. @DW
item.keywords: DWVC,India, G20, USA, Russia, Ukraine, China, foreign politics, foreign affairs, Blinken, Lavrov, Modi

media:content.media:title: G20 foreign ministers at odds over Ukraine
media:content.media:keywords: DWVC,India, G20, USA, Russia, Ukraine, China, foreign politics, foreign affairs, Blinken, Lavrov, Modi

item.title: One month after the deadly Syria-Turkey earthquake
item.description: At 4:17 a.m. on 6 February 2023, a 7.7 magnitude earthquake struck southern Turkey. Thousands of buildings collapsed in Turkey and Syria. Now, a month later, both countries are still mourning their losses.
item.keywords: DWVC,quake, earthquake, Turkey, Syria, natural disaster, catastrophe

media:content.media:title: One month after the deadly Syria-Turkey earthquake
media:content.media:keywords: DWVC,quake, earthquake, Turkey, Syria, natural disaster, catastrophe
